d. Vaginal Examination
Vaginal examination is a tool to assess the cervix’s favourability for induction or to confirm the progress of labour 
by assessing the cervical dilatation. Detailed step wise procedure is enclosed in annexure 3.
Vaginal examination should not be carried out if there is any history of vaginal bleeding, previous history of 
miscarriage, and early rupture of membrane.Prior to the procedure, an abdominal assessment and aus
